title: Страница творчества Blackbird5154
source:
[[include theme:russian-art-hub]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[module CSS]]
.img1 {margin-right: 10px; display: inline-block; vertical-align: top;}
.img1 p {margin-bottom: 5px}
.shield {background-color: #999999; width: 285px; outline: 1px solid black; padding-left: 5px; font-size: 13px; color: white; text-shadow: 2px 1px 2px #000;}
.header1 {background-color: #660000; line-height: 32px; font-size: 16px; color: white; text-shadow: 2px 1px 2px #000; text-align: center; margin-top: 50px;}
.header1:first-child {margin-top: 15px;}
[[/module]]

[[module CSS]]
#header h1 a::before {
    content: "SCP-RU ArtWork-hub";
    color: white;
    text-shadow: 1px 1px 0px black;
}

#header h1 a span{
    display: block;
    content: "";
    visibility: hidden;
}

[[/module]]
